locations.title: HEARTLAND TRUCK STOP
locations.content: HEARTLAND TRUCK STOP may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Plenty of food choices for late night cravings. Open 24/7. Shower is clean-ish for $7.00. It can get stuffy in there though, it needs fan and a little bit more water pressure.
I STOP FOR THE NIGHT.  I GOT A SHOWER FOR $7.00  AND THE LADY IN THE PHONE TOLD ME THAT IT WAS FREE .THAT OK FOR $7.00 IS GOOD SHOWER. The pizza is ok too. The SHOWER got toilet
Omg! The shower was good! I should have done it 6 weeks ago.... okay, just kidding,  it was only 3 days after the last one. ‚Ä¶
The place was clean and staff seemed nice and very helpful. We used the shower there it was clean and nice. Thank you.

This place was a great stop! Very friendly staff, nice large parking lot to sleep for the night in our RV and the showers were just right! $6 for a shower, no time limit, got the whole family in, in one trip. Best gas prices on this section ‚Ä¶
Really good food and great selection of food and other items you might need. Showers are only $7.00 small shower room but can't bet the price üëç ‚Ä¶

Men and Women's Restrooms, Three Single Person Shower's for Rent Per Individual, a small but, modern laundromat and outside was just a nice place to sit under the stars in our best car we ever had  rest a our First Day of Springs

‚Ä¶ cakes and sweetbreads.  Whole loaf of fresh banana bread 3.99. Big ol salad (to much for one person: 3.99.  I could go on n on. Shower: 6.00. Wash machines n catscale.  Bathroom and showers not the best but clean.  And very friendly staff. ‚Ä¶
Always good food can get a clean shower here people are nice and willing to help one of the best stops of my trip
This truck stop is small but in here good food and nice and clean shower ..

showerReviews.reviewText: Very poor water pressure in the shower if you wanna get wet, take a bucket of water in with you.   $3.05 for a cup of coffee and not a lot of parking.

So I roll in park then I reserve my shower. SHOWER  5 is ready and the code. I get to the door #5 , enter the code twice no access. I asked the shower attendant for assistance. He looks at the number on the door he entered the code off of ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the country that I go. Whenever I see a employee  in there, they only sweep the floor. Its often the same with the shower stalls. Naked dirty trash cans and private toilet not being cleaned inside the bowl. And they don't want to use ‚Ä¶

It was awful. Paid for shower and got in ok. I only had 30 seconds of hot water and the rest of the time it was lukewarm. I let it run for 20 minutes and never got hot at all. If they don't have hot water just say showers don't work. Try ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but we won't be back to this one.  The whole place was a mess. Bathrooms looked like they hadn't been cleaned in over a month.  The shower had no soap in it. Floors hadn't been cleaned in days.  I could go on to but you get the point.

Not very clean. We waited about an hour for the shower, Heather had to be the center of attention, didn't salt around pumps till 9 am. Cussing by Heather after she knocked on a persons truck and they got mad at her, it was f this and f that ‚Ä¶
I stopped to take a shower, they just told me they don't have hot water.  but the bathrooms do have.  They do it so they don't have to clean the showers at night.

‚Ä¶ when you Drive 2000 miles plus a week you love it when you see that pilot he thinking man got clean bathrooms give me a shower freshen up be back ready on the road again thanks guys for doing a good job God bless you and I giving you a 2 ‚Ä¶
went in to take shower towels smells awful and on top of that shower barely luke warm at best
No customer service no shower no restroom 00000

showerReviews.reviewText: I WILL NEVER RETURN.  40mins for a shower that never happened!?  I went, paid for a shower, and was given a customer number and pin.  I noticed the TVs were out and their speakers play music loud, so customers can't hear "your number called ‚Ä¶

10 a.m. Stopped in for fuel. Wanted a sandwich and a shower. Cashier was nice. The manager here is amazing. She runs around greeting people, cleaning, talking to staff and customers. Pilot should clone her. Anyway, there were 6 people ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ services but just like this place they do nothing to make things better. I read the view while I wait for a shower so far 1.5hours wait and I was # two in line. Whatched the guest before me that already showered and left. And still no one ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Except for their bank accounts. Because this is what they think how professional drivers are to be treated. God this place is nasty. And you will have someone tell you that yeah they would have their own mother take a shower in this.
If there was 0 star stars i will give 0 star to this pump i waited for 55 minutes for the shower but still no updates amd stagf doesnt know what to do Worst pump
There was a really terrible stench in shower number 3. It made my mood worse for the day. And the fan didn't work.
If u want to waste ur time come take shower here all the time no one clean the showers and u have to wait one hour or more
Was over an hour wait for a shower simply because they weren't being cleaned.  Horrible management.
Nice big shower rooms, but they are extremely dirty.   It looks like the floors and showers haven't been cleaned or mopped in weeks
Do not stop there for shower.  Every time 5-10  person waiting and wery slow cleaning.

showerReviews.reviewText: Went in to use restroom and wash a few dishes, lady working was cleaning restroom and tells me to use shower (3) . I head to shower 3 lock the door, said shower room was recently used so hadn't been cleaned yet. No toilet paper (amen for ‚Ä¶

After a long hard drive it was a pleasant surprise to walk in and find out my shower was free, and a hell lot nicer than most places that will charge you $12 or more for some busted up stall with a threadbare towel. Even just the few ‚Ä¶

They have good food, decent price on diesel ($2.89) and  4 free showers for truckers, but you have to wait for over an hour for the showers to be ready. I couldn't wait. So next truck stop I got everything exactly the same (except for ‚Ä¶

I ve been here before,but today I needed fuel,so I figured:take advantage of low priced fuel and get a shower,win/win,I had forgotten about the FREE SHOWER,one of the few places that does nice things for drivers. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Two paper thin pancakes that had no flavor is all it takes to drive people away. Ladies restroom was not working so they directed me a shower stall that had a sink but no soap to wash your hands after using the RR. I was not pleased. Sorry ‚Ä¶
Nice casual place. Diner, fuel,shower,laundry. Large gravel lot so plenty of parking.
Awesome truck stop. Lots of parkong space. Free shower for drivers. Friendly staff

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ , terrible terrible now my trailer is in the shop. What can I do, I'm so worried about my truck and trailer. I don't even have time to shower or get something good to eat. I'm eating salad every night and still overweight, embarrassing.

‚Ä¶ the process that was to take place in insuring the correct parts were changed. I also got a shower and a meal because I had to stay over night. TA Matthews Missouri have the personnel that make getting repairs a lot less stressful than ‚Ä¶

So Elizabeth. Manager on duty. Refused to help when scale ticket was lost after like an hour ago while taking a shower. So to reweight could be done. She didn‚Äôt offer to do anything other than just to pay again. No way to reprint it or look ‚Ä¶

Filthy shower... Guess they've never heard of a toilet brush and don't know how to clean a toilet. TA is as nasty as PILOT now. Is it incompetence? Or do you not care? You've turned your back on the drivers that made you.

The one star is for the shower and the gentleman that works in that area of the facility. Such a kind man and graciously offered to open the door for me when my hands were full. The staff at the retail desk were very nice and helpful so ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stop where there is not garbage laying all over the grass surrounding it or piled up on the fuel Island. My shower was clean and the people were friendly. Would be better if there was a sit-down restaurant rather than fast food garbage.

Lazy employees here... The clean shower that I was given still had a dirty wash rag in the shower... The sink still had hair in it.... Talked to management and they had it cleaned again. But as I watched the 2 guys clean it all they did was ‚Ä¶
the shower doesn't work, the toilet doesn't either

Don't bother trying to shower here.  Driver's get shower coupons and don't go shower and system doesn't clear them off.  I waited 20 min and three driver's never showed up.  When I asked about shower they paged driver's instead of clearing ‚Ä¶

Our company recently started to bring TA some if our fuel business. The showers here are amazing (used to use pilot/fj) the staff was quite helpful and energetic (hence 5 stars). Lady at the desk helped me at the kiosk to obtain my shower ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ . My day was the most disgusting in the last year, thanks to the employee of this place. As usual, I ordered a shower through my mobile app, it was shower number 5, I entered the password to go in there, I went in and washed myself ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ just dirty. Bathrooms the same. I couldn‚Äôt wash my hands bc 2 employees were standing around in front of sinks & wouldn‚Äôt let me get by them, seriously. Showers were better, good water pressure & hot! The shower doesn‚Äôt have a partition ‚Ä¶

Can't leave a negative star on it. Waited for half an hour for a shower to get cleaned and ended up cancelling it. Guess when a bus comes in drivers get put on the back burners. Should have pushed to bloomsdale. Bus or not, they keep up ‚Ä¶

I'm an OTR truck driver so I shower at Love's travel stops all over the country. This is by far the worst. As you can see there is black mold on the ceiling and it is falling down in flakes. The grouting is molding and discolored. There was ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Shower door #6 looks like it was kicked in by ATF looking for pistol braces... floors looked like Saddam's palace the day after the Marines showed up ,,,but.... ‚Ä¶

Been waiting an hour for a shower there was two ladies and very few customers.  Only need one cashier and neither one of them wanted to clean the showers for us hard working truck drivers.  They went and adjust the clothing and also filled ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ The shower doors are broken. The roof leaks. The soda machine is broken. SHUT IT DOWN.

Worst love‚Äôs truck stop ever, I stopped for a shower, waiting 30 mins, no call, went to check the showers, open door and dirty, 6 of them, no one cleaning them, asked the young lady if they were going to clean up, goes to the other lady in ‚Ä¶
No shop, no shower, no laundry

At 3:00 AM check in shower app waited 45 minutes no shower yet all were dirty no one to clean them. Coffee bar was filfly and only 1 person at counter in the whole place. So got fuel and no one pulls up after fuel, Fuel Island nasty all ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The showers are decent. There are 8 showers, and at least they are hot and an average size. The attendant for the shower is right on.  Very little wait for showers. ‚Ä¶
